transcription.text: Since 2018, activist Greta Thunberg has used social media to bring young people into the climate change conversation. Primarily active on Twitter and Instagram, she has organised and documented schools striking for climate action, protests and sit-ins internationally – and recently sparred online with alt-right influencer Andrew Tate, a high profile exchange that was interrupted by his arrest on human trafficking charges. This video of her detainment at an anti-mining protest in Germany displays Thunberg’s staunchness, shot through with the audacity that makes her a compelling campaigner.

work.title: Greta Thunberg detained at anti-mining protest
